page.title: 09HINCKLEY - INTRODUCTION
page.content:
Hinckley is largely a residential area with few industrial or commercial employers. There are a large number of hosiery and knitwear factories, but many of the residents on the new housing estates travel out of Hinckley for employment. In our area we found that most people worked in Hinckley or the Hinckley area, but there were a number who worked elsewhere and the following is a list of alternative areas of employment in descending order of popularity.
a) Coventry b) Leicester c) Nuneaton d) Birmingham e) Burbage f) Sapcote
